alert.note: Alert for Monroe; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:38PM CDT until March 31 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Southern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... Central Jefferson County in east central Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barnhart, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waterloo and Columbia around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Belleville, Freeburg, Smithton and Mascoutah. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 178 and 191. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri.
